attributes.long-description:
A frantic shooting game set in a medieval era with unique manga-like graphics.

Help the nun defeat evil with some heavy zombie-killing action! Venture across multiple locations to purge the town of all its living-dead inhabitants.

Buy new skills as you progress day after day. Refill your energy by slicing zombies with your mighty scythe, then unleash the destructive powers of your artillery!

FEATURES:
- A mighty scythe with various combos,
- 6 range weapons from machine gun to explosive nukes,
- 11 skills to buy and upgrade,
- An immersive storyline with epic boss encounters!
- Multiple kinds of zombies behaviours. Beware of grabbers!
- 10 breath-taking environments to discover by day and night.

attributes.name: Twin Blades
